ygData.msgSnippet: Motormaster turned to the two stunticons, okay move out with those orders Wildrider nudged Drag Strip, Oh boy oh boy oh boy oh boy, looks like we finally

Subject: Re: Meeting the big bot
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster turned to the two stunticons, "okay move out" with those orders
Wildrider nudged Drag Strip, "Oh boy oh boy oh boy oh boy, looks like we
finally get some action, eat my dust" with that he leaps forward converting
util he hits the ground in his car mode, then he starts excellerating to
250mph, "ha ha ha, try to keep up ya slow poke" he yells to Drag Strip.
While seeing this Motormaster puts a hand on his face in dissgust of his
comrades sanity and stupidity.
